wiki.summary: "One Kiss" is a song recorded by Scottish record producer Calvin Harris and English singer Dua Lipa. Written by Lipa, Jessie Reyez and its producer Harris, it was released by Columbia Records on 6 April 2018, as the second single from Harris' upcoming sixth studio album. "One Kiss" is an uptempo deep house song that contains elements of '90s house music. It features "a lengthy instrumental intro", after which Lipa coos on the "mellow synths" and later moves on to a "club-conquering, mostly instrumental" chorus. Read more on Last.fm.
